title: NEW KATARINA SKIN KELMET CRACK!

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
You know how katarina has a scar on her left eye? why not add a scratch mark or a crack on her visor for the new project skin? 

Just a thought :)

replies.body: thats a really good idea honestly
I mean the design would only scratch the surface of the skin's potential if you know what I mean.
Someone get this man/woman a cookie!

YEAH LET'S MAKE ALL THE ROBOTS, SYMBOLS OF PERFECTION, HAVE HUMAN FLAWS

{{champion:112}} NORMIES STAY OUT OF MY ROBOT SKINS REEEEEEEEEEEE

One problem tho, no wait, multiple problems . They're not robots and they're not Viktor's. Viktor made battlecast, not Project. They're cyborgs, artificial bodies with a human mind, plus they clearly have synthetic flesh on their faces. Additionally, if they're so "perfect" why did Fiora and Lucian break Yi out of his prison like thing from those that sought to use them as tools? Why is Ashe fighting for humanity? Because with one exception(zed) the Projects(cyborgs) are trying to become human or recover what's left of their humanity, and what are humans if not flawed?

Cyborgs are basically robots, with human brains who works as proccesors, nothing more and nothing less. There's 0% human in them. + 90% of the champions who get "cyborged" are getting weaker and more useless as cyborgs, because they SHOULD lose 99% of their abilities which were clearly human/mentallity possible, or magic. Which a robot cannot do.

What. It is more than that. Here to understand cyborgs better I recommend you play metal gear revegance. Everything about cyborgs will make more sense.

And they would not look those abilities. IN that world Yi/Zed/Fiora are still capable of blinking. Plus how would you get weaker by becoming machine enhanced? And their brains are more than just processors. It's their brain from when they were human, likely from their original body which is likely badly damage or possibly even recently dead. 

And no they are not the same thing as robots. Their thinking, decision making, personality, everything comes from their human brain, which is directly planted in their new bodies head. 

I do believe in the project world magic is not a thing, and instead is all about science. Kat doesn't use magic btw, that's only in game. Looking at it from every cinematic, every skin, every everything she uses her daggers, her wits and her skills, not magic. The only thing lore wise that's magic is her shunpo.

Katarina's shunpo is thank to her inhuman reflex, giving her the ability to control the portals, which gets DESTROYED by project stuff. Because it's impossible to copy it. Quit arguing with me. They kill the champion. make a robot and bcome weaker, only reason they keep the abilities ingame is, because it's a game. 
Cyborg is a robot nothing more nothing less, it's not the person which it once was, the brain is a proccesor with small amount of old memeories and nothing else. Better go read some books about the brain instead of telling me to watch or play something else... Thanks for your time and your aggresive answer towards me. 
These skins are wrong and nothing can change it.

A brain is much much much much more than just "a processor with a few old memories" and a cyborg is much different than a robot. A robot is entirely machine where as a cyborg is much more organic. I'm not sure how that doesn't make sense to you, but whatever. 

But I am going to stop arguing with you. You obviously care too much for this champion, and clearly just want to ogle her and you are upset this isn't a fan service skin, so it's whatever man. I can live knowing I'm right and you're wrong and nothing can change that.

Btw I wasn't being aggressive, I was simply stating facts.

Fallout 4, Robot brains, /thread

There's your facts, you're aggresive, im offended.

Quit aruging with me, I already got enough phyisical and mental damage from that ugly skin

OK. I see you will not change your opinion on anything and can't see that it makes sense because you can't see tits. I get it, it makes sense. You want your video game chicks in as little clothing possible, hence why you want pool party instead.

M8, you realize im the same person you wrote few days ago in an other thread about a pool party skin saying im horny for it and stuff and then I literally bashed you back with facts provoing you wrong and you had to say sorry? Or you want me to rewrite the whole thing again? I dont give a damn about her boobs, I just wnat her to be alive and a human...

Yeah we've never talked before this thread, sorry fam. So go ahead and rewrite it, it wasn't me. And I understand that you want her alive and human and not a cyborg, but that doesn't mean you're other points are right. Just because you don't like something doesn't mean it's dumb and just because you don't understand the difference between something doesn't make it the same.

I'm positive it was you, nobody writes that anoying like you. It wasnt on this thread and it was about me wanting pool party skin instead this abonimation. And nobody else blindly calls others perverts. ^^ But if u want a real explanation you cna always make/log an EUW acc and add me, im currently online
It wasn't me. The only pool party thing I talked about was the crab in Fiora's pp skin.
excuse me, just noticed im online on my other account (kapyrina) ^^

I meant "robot skin" including battlecast, mecha, and project

Nobody would make a broken Katarina fresh outta the box
So you also don't understand the difference between cyborg and robot, nice.
That icon is not even Katarina's official icon.  It looks horrible.

yea I was in a hurry and just googled a Katarina icon and took a screenshot of the first icon i saw. I also noticed the mistake in the title too late but I didn't expect this post to get so much attention.
Yeah ive seen that one before. It makes her look like a zombie :/

Sure...

You know, not including the rotting flesh

Or the discoloration

Or the inability to use weapons

or the lack of hair

But they both don't exist.

So there's that.
Jeeze people cant take some sarcasm?...
Just delete that stupid project skin and make a pool party instead, seriously... That's not Katarina... Just a rip off robot

*Cyborg

You insensitive jerk.
Its literally the same.

A cyborg is a human whose body is largely or mostly mechanical. A robot is a robot. A robot is not alive, unless it has an AI or something, then you can start the whole debate on what classifies as life.

Cyborg
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/teentitans/images/c/c6/Cyborg-teen-titans2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131231095447

Robot
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/disney/images/8/85/Wall-e.jpg.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140429123637

Are you kdiding me? There's robots in different shapes and size, not only wall-i. Plus if you wanna do it game style like, go play fallout 4, robobrains are literal human brains in robotic bodies, or cyborgs as you call em. They dont look or act much human :3

Bud, I bought Fallout 4 on release day. I put over 100 hours into it, and got every Trophy on PS4. Fallout is my all time favorite game franchise. Though as much as liked 4, it butchered the dialogue system, one of the main reasons I adore 2, 3, and New Vegas (I'm not especially fond of the first game for it's irritating time-limits right out of the gate).

I wouldn't consider a Robobrain a cyborg. I'm not sure what I'd call it. Which makes me wonder what EXACTLY classifies a cyborg. How far from a human shape can one go before becoming something else?

But this is getting into some Ghost in the Shell territory, so I'm just gonna stop here.
You're wasting your time trying to convince this guy of anything, just leave him, he won't understand.
At least I dont go blindly calling others perverts who sexualize stuff... right? ^^
Yeah but i didn't blindly call you anything. You said this skin is shit and it should be pool party. Plus you said you were horny for it in another comment, lol.

I never said Im horny in public or even in private. If you confuse me with someone who has the same name as me but is from NA or EUNE then it's your own problem. I said replace with pool party ,because we had teaser for it TWICE already. And the project IS horrible... So yeah you blindly call me a perv and horny, if you were in my country I could of easily sued you and won for that...
Sue me for calling you horny? That's not even an insult, let alone a criminal offense able to go to court. LOL.
Here it is and it isnt called insult but defamation...
I'm gonna guess U.K. then.
Dont bother, you'll never guess and it's none of your busness anyway :p

I had a raoborain in a human body (assaultron) so it's a cyborg. /thread

p.s I got 400+ hours on steam FO4, so please... get on my level kek

p.s 2 skyrim over 3000, with Katarina as the dragonborn LITERALLY ^^

Dont argue with me, kay? I'm pissed off enough cuz that skin already

> [{quoted}](name=I Heart Katarina,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TGqAdodz,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-21T11:01:14.705+0000)
>
> Jeeze people cant take some sarcasm?...

what part was sarcasm?


also...
> [{quoted}](name=Kitty Katarina,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TGqAdodz,comment-id=0002000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-20T21:35:13.450+0000)
>
> I had a raoborain in a human body (assaultron) so it's a cyborg. /thread
> 
> p.s I got 400+ hours on steam FO4, so please... get on my level kek
> 
> p.s 2 skyrim over 3000, with Katarina as the dragonborn LITERALLY ^^
> 
> Dont argue with me, kay? I'm pissed off enough cuz that skin already

A cyborg is a living creature with parts of its body augmented with mechanical ones, I personally would consider {{champion:112}} a cyborg, but that's just my view. 

p.s. just googled the definition of cyborg, here it is
a fictional or hypothetical person whose physical abilities are extended beyond normal human limitations by mechanical elements built into the body.

There's literally 99 different explanations of a cyborg. You accept one and I accept other. So arguing about it is pointless... This skin stays disgusting and must be removed and replaced with pool party. /thread
honestly ur right tho. project katarina is awful in comparison to all the other skins. really really bad

It's awful compared to everything. IT's literally 0% Katarina, just a stupid robot rip off... There's literally no way she could even agree to be "projectise" in any "alternative" future as they call it... Like literally you got everything, money, power, beauty, all the joys of life you can wish for, one of the best fighting skills in the world of runeterra, inhuman reflex and speed and you'll throw all that away for "Inhuman" reflext which you already have and a scanner? Yeah... Lore shows she's smart, not a 12  year old kid hyped over robots to ruin her whole life into a project...

Worst skin, worst lore idea towards it, worse idea overall... ^^ And ofc the NOT Kata mains or ppl who will just play her 10 times after they buy the skin, go full hype giving the wrong impression to Riot that it's a good idea... While me and other ppl who are less real mains than me, but still main her a lot are pissed off at the idea their champ to get humiliated with such a skin... This is the main thing that drives me crazy... I got 5-6 accounts with her level 7 over 100k mastery, 1 acc with 740k and my opinion on this matter is 0, but that guy who says its' "awesome" with his 5k mastery points on her, does? Bah... 

Whatever... Who needs a pool party Katarina right? It's not like we didnt geta teaser of it TWICE at ziggs splash art and now at Fiora's... Better do an ugly project skin...

In the project lore I'm pretty sure they don't really have a choice(remember this is an alternate future, it's a future world not a medieval/Renaissance/steampunk one) and basically what it seems like is humanity is almost dead and they need soldiers who can compete with these advanced robots. 

Like look who else is there. Super seasoned warriors. It makes sense.
0 sense, 0 sense, 0sense, she's already phyisical and mentallity stronger than a robot or any human. Inhuman reflex remember?

How is she stronger than a robot(which she's not btw she's a cyborg)? How? If anything, it only enhances what they are. Look at YI Yasuo Fiora or Zed. It's states they took warriors and enhanced them making them stronger then they were previously. They all have inhuman reflexes too, yet theirs are also increased only making them stronger.
Read all the stuff I wrote in this thread. 99% were answers to you. Quit answering to me with the same question written in a different way
You just keep saying "inhuman reflexes" and expecting that to convince me.
Although I agree with you to a point, I do think she could make a goid project skin, however this one in particular is pretty trash, especially for 1350 RP.

If I'm insensitive then why I get so worked up both phyisical and mentally over this project skin? Because I am more sensible on that matter than any of you, who just want to murder her and make her a machine...
